A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout electric roller blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. Due to their chain-free control options their electric roller blinds are inherently child-safe by design, and if you upgrade with the smart home hub, their electric roller blinds become controllable with your mobile phone.

products.title: Bella Blackout Frost White Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Bella is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. The bella blackout frost roller blind in a neutral white colour will suit almost any room.
